about_the_game:
🎮 Welcome to Hentai Clicker: Maria is Streaming

Enter a world of allure and excitement with Hentai Clicker: Maria is Streaming, where Maria, the charming maid, awaits your every click. Collect hearts, unlock new outfits, and dive into an interactive experience filled with fun and surprises!

🍑 About the Game

Immerse yourself in an enchanting world where each click brings you closer to revealing Maria’s playful secrets. Collect hearts and progress through captivating stages as you unlock new outfits and exciting rewards. Upgrade your abilities to gather hearts faster and reach your goals.

🎉 Features

  • 🎨 Gorgeous Anime Art: Enjoy beautifully drawn anime-style visuals that bring Maria to life.

  • 🔞 Explicit Content: Unlock uncensored, explicit scenes with Maria in the premium edition.

  • 🎯 Engaging Goals: Unlock new stages and outfits, ranging from the classic maid look to daring, revealing designs.

  • 🖱️ Addictive Clicker Gameplay: Simple and fun mechanics that keep you clicking for more.

  • 💪 Upgrade Abilities: Enhance your heart collection speed with upgrades from "Basic" to "Eternal."

  • 👗 Wardrobe Expansion: Unlock a wide variety of outfits in both the free and premium versions.

  • 🔥 Interactive Experience: Enjoy voice acting and dialogue that reacts to your progress, with even more content in the premium edition.

💖 Why You'll Love It

Hentai Clicker: Maria is Streaming offers more than just a game—it's an interactive experience. Whether you're drawn in by the art, the satisfying clicker gameplay, or Maria herself, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

🎮 How to Play

  • 🖱️ Click to Collect Hearts: The more you click, the more hearts you gather!

  • 🔓 Unlock New Stages: Use hearts to reveal Maria's new outfits and secret scenes.

  • 🚀 Upgrade Your Skills: Invest in upgrades to boost your heart collection rate and progress faster.

🎉 Join the Fun!

Are you ready to join the fun? Start playing Hentai Clicker: Maria is Streaming today and discover all the secrets waiting to be unlocked!

content_descriptors.notes:
Hentai Clicker: Maria is Streaming contains explicit adult content that may not be suitable for all audiences. This game includes:

Sexual Content: The premium version features uncensored, explicit sex scenes. These scenes include graphic depictions of various sexual acts and nudity.

Visual and Voice Content: High-quality anime art depicting sexual scenarios, along with voice acting that may include suggestive or explicit dialogue.

Themes of Sexual Fantasy: The game is centered around playful, fantasy-based scenarios and interactions, which are designed for mature audiences seeking erotic entertainment.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Carte intégrée (Intel HD Graphics 3000)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Apple Silicon and Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11
  • Processor: Apple Silicon and Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: 🔞Step into a world of playful discovery with Hentai Clicker: Maria is Streaming!❤️ Collect hearts, unlock daring outfits, and upgrade abilities in this addictive clicker game. Enjoy stunning anime visuals, explicit content in premium, and interactive voice acting for a truly immersive experience.
